dedahas hayasiya wani sambuddhathwa jayanthiya nimiththen kolambaa, kotuwa shri sambuddhaloka wiharasthanaye abhinawayen idikerunu dhathu mandiraye shri sarwagnya dhathun wahanse sahitha dhathu karanduwa janadhipathi mahinda rajapaksha mahathage athin pereda (26) thanpath kerina.kotuwa shri sambuddhaloka wiharasthanaye wiharadhipathi mahacharya iththademaliye indrasara swamin wahansege anushasana paridi witharandeniye medhananda himiyange meheyawimen me uthsawaya sanwidhana kara thibina.wiharasthanayata pamini janadhipathithuma buddha prathima wahanse wetha mal puja kara aagamika wathawathwala niratha wimen anathuruwa dhathu karanduwa thanpath kaleya.rajakiya panditha balangoda sobhitha nayaka himiyo pramukha maha sangharathnaya seth pirith sajjayana karamin janadhipathithumata aashirwada kalaha.kotuwa shri sambuddhaloka wiharasthanaye wiharadhipathi mahacharya iththademaliye indrasara swamin wahanse baha daka suwaduk wimasu janadhipathiwaraya unwahanse wetha pirikara puja kaleya.janadhipathiwarayage samprapthiya nimiththen samaru satahanak indrasara himiyo janadhipathiwaraya wetha piliganwuha.adhyapana amathi bandula gunawardhana, kolambaa disthrik parlimenthu manthri thilanga sumathipala, eksath prawruththi pathra samagame sabhapathi jyeshta madhyawedi bandula padmakumara mahathwaru athulu pirisakda me awasthawata ek wa sitiyaha..

jathika aarakshawata yayi ho noyek noyek sanwardhana katayuthuwalata yayi pa්rakashakaramin, yuddhayen pidawata pathwu damila janathawage mul idam nawatha labadimata nohaki bawata yudha hamudawa pa්rakashakarana wita, witen wita eki idam nawatha labadennata haki yayi wiwidha awasthawaladi janathawa aamantha්ranaya karana janadhipathi agamathi, mathi amathiwaru wiwidha porondu labadethii.
mama hithan hitiye chithra karanna, habayi thoranna kalin dawase koyi ekatath kiyala gedarin ahuwa.

eksath jathika pakshaye purna prathisanwidhanayath samanga pakshaya janathawa atharata genayama sambandhayen warthawak prathisanwidhana katayuthu wenuwen pathkara thibena kandayamata thama bharadun bawath ema warthawata wada yahapath warthawak thibenawa nam eya kriyathmaka kalata thamata gataluwak nomathi bawada range bandara mahatha sandahan karayi.
lunu yusha hise galwa hisa sambahanaya kara aduma tharamin winadi 30 wath thabiya yuthu athara obata payaka pamana kalayak thaba ganimata hakinam wadi prathipala laba ganna puluwan.
